channel.title: I need a lot of help
channel.description:
I'm pretty much a first time poster, well this would be my fourth post or something. But I'm really new to this and need some help. Everyone has to start somewhere.
Okay, well I downloaded the ZenithScape and Zenith client at here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555776.0.html .
What my problem is, is that I just do not know what to do. I have read through that thread and tried ways to get it to work, but I just don't know what to do. When I compile the server, it says the path is not specified and then says it has finished compiling the folders and stuff. Once I run the server, then try connect with the client, I get stuck on "Checking for updates %1". Can someone help me? I also wish to play the server on LAN with a few friends, could someone help me with that also?

item.title: I need a lot of help
item.dc:creator: @Toriton Toriton
item.description:
@Toriton wrote:

I’m pretty much a first time poster, well this would be my fourth post or something.
But I’m really new to this and need some help. Everyone has to start somewhere.

Okay, well I downloaded the ZenithScape and Zenith client at here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555776.0.html .

What my problem is, is that I just do not know what to do. I have read through that thread and tried ways to get it to work, but I just don’t know what to do.
When I compile the server, it says the path is not specified and then says it has finished compiling the folders and stuff.
Once I run the server, then try connect with the client, I get stuck on “Checking for updates %1”. Can someone help me?
I also wish to play the server on LAN with a few friends, could someone help me with that also?

Read full topic
